issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
{{ITestBlobDataValidation}} has a storage event callback which is invoked to check the MD5 checksum. If the upload failed this check is false â€”but the root cause is lost due to the assertion error raised.

Proposed: have the callback check the result of the error and only look for the MD5 value on a successful upload.
fields.summary: ITestBlobDataValidation gets confused if upload fails

comments.body:
As well as checking for result=200 (or a specific error code?), the assert should add a message on that assertion failure (always)
{code}

This is a WASB issue, right?Â  Why is it linked to HADOOP-15407?
its surfacing in my abfs test runs, but yes, its unrelated. moving to standalone issue
